description.ko: 사막의 건조한 균열부터 숲 이끼와 화산암의 부드러운 질감에 이르기까지, 지구의 다양한 표면을 놀라운 지질학적 디테일로 탐구합니다.
description.en: An exploration of Earth's diverse surfaces, from the arid cracks of a desert to the soft textures of forest moss and volcanic rock, captured in stunning geological detail.

prompt: Top-down cinematic aerial view of diverse earth textures, cracked clay desert soil transitioning into lush green mossy terrain and volcanic basalt, 8k resolution, hyper-realistic, intricate geological details, slow camera pan, organic patterns, satellite photography style, natural lighting.
